column4: Why does my login screen not fit the screen?  it it my resolution?   Its like its zoomed in and panned over to the top left. all i see is a input field.
sounds like you may have to check yoru xorg.conf file. sounds like its defaulting to a higher resolution than it thinks your monitor is
ok im in the file waht do i look for
look down toward the end of it. i would suggest to google modelines for your monitor, so it can have the correct resolution for it
what is the native resolution for your monitor?
im not sure. its a widescreen by gateway
go to system > prefferences > screen resolution. what is it running?
ive had to chage that. with sudo displayconfig-gtk
i get everything from 320X240 to 1600X XXXX
still looking for the native resolution
are you sure thats your monitor? im not finding any info on the internet about it
Got it at walmart. il get that page for you
ZOMG my computer now has a virus! i must reinstall my ubuntu!!! =P
